title: Type gifts
content:

Here are last year’s [Typophile Holiday Gift Recommendations](http://web.archive.org/web/20071218193451/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29972)

Room and Board is selling framed wood type ’scultpture/art’.

It’s not for sale online, but it’s in their showrooms.

I can’t tell if they are nice, or an insult. Seems a waste of perfectly good wood type!

House’s Girard Alphabet blocks are real nice, if a bit spendy for play blocks:
